statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Pepperdine 50, Portland 48
article.story: SAN DIEGO (AP) -- Tyrone Shelley scored 21 points, including the go-ahead points in overtime, to give Pepperdine a 50-48 win over Portland in the first round of the West Coast Conference tournament Friday night. Pepperdine (11-20) squandered an 11-point lead in the final 6 1/2 minutes of the second half before rebounding behind Shelley in overtime. The freshman tied the score at 48 with a short jumper at the 1:36 mark of overtime before giving the Waves a 50-48 lead with a pair of free throws with 37.5 seconds left. Portland (9-22), which led just once in the game, missed a chance to tie when Taishi Ito missed a jumper in the lane with two seconds left. Sherrard Watson scored 17 points to lead the Pilots, who missed six of seven shots in overtime. Nik Raivio's jumper with 3:17 left in overtime were Portland's only overtime points and gave the Pilots their only lead of the game at 48-46. Portland trailed 44-33 with 6:28 left before outscoring Pepperdine 13-2 and tied the score at 46 on Raivio's 3-pointer with 54.2 seconds left to force overtime. Raivio finished with 12 points. Pepperdine took control in the first half with a 27-15 halftime lead despite shooting just 35.5 percent from the field and getting outrebounded 24-10. The sixth-seeded Waves will face No. 3 seed San Diego in a quarterfinal-round game Saturday night.
